DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effectiveness two topical cream atopic dermatitis pediatric subject . Subjects randomly assign use one two cream twice daily 6 week clear .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Safety Two Topical Creams Pediatric Atopic Dermatitis
